name: TestExpBackoffEstimation
cases: explain select * from exp_backoff where a = 1
explain select * from exp_backoff where b = 1
explain select * from exp_backoff where c = 1
explain select * from exp_backoff where d >= 3 and d <= 5
explain select * from exp_backoff where a = 1 and b = 1 and c = 1 and d >= 3 and d<= 5
explain select * from exp_backoff where a = 1 and b = 1 and c = 1 and d >= 3 and d<= 5

name: TestNULLOnFullSampling
cases: show stats_topn
show stats_buckets

name: TestDefaultSelectivityForStrMatch
cases: set @@tidb_default_string_match_selectivity = 0.8
explain select * from t where a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b like '%test%'
explain select * from t where b not like '%test%'
explain select * from t where b regexp '.*test.*'
explain select * from t where b not regexp '.*test.*'
explain select * from t where b like '%test%' and a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b not like '%test%' and a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b like '%test%' or a + 10 > 100
set @@tidb_default_string_match_selectivity = 0.9
explain select * from t where a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b like '%test%'
explain select * from t where b not like '%test%'
explain select * from t where b regexp '.*test.*'
explain select * from t where b not regexp '.*test.*'
explain select * from t where b like '%test%' and a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b not like '%test%' and a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b like '%test%' or a + 10 > 100
set @@tidb_default_string_match_selectivity = 0.1
explain select * from t where a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b like '%test%'
explain select * from t where b not like '%test%'
explain select * from t where b regexp '.*test.*'
explain select * from t where b not regexp '.*test.*'
explain select * from t where b like '%test%' and a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b not like '%test%' and a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b like '%test%' or a + 10 > 100
set @@tidb_default_string_match_selectivity = 0
explain select * from t where a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b like '%test%'
explain select * from t where b not like '%test%'
explain select * from t where b regexp '.*test.*'
explain select * from t where b not regexp '.*test.*'
explain select * from t where b like '%test%' and a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b not like '%test%' and a + 10 > 100
explain select * from t where b like '%test%' or a + 10 > 100
